title: TK

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Throw a target into another one telekinesis, the first will use a random ability on the second unless they are Control Immune.
- TK's Ultimate Ability, It uses its powers to reform the mind of a target, changing their goal to the Mutant goal and giving them access to the factional chat, kill and block, this ability costs 2 non-killing ultimate uses. (2 uses (It costs 2), shared by non-killing mutants)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, you will learn the name and role of a random player that visited the mutants each night, 2 names if you are blocking.
- Redirect and Control immune.

desc:
Post 3519
*TK is small, frail mutant with telekinetic powers, resembling a bird embryo, its true body is encased in a sphere of turquoise plasma, with thin limbs.*
